text: Deux Rivières is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Yonne department in central France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Cravant (the seat) and Accolay.Arrêté préfectoral 26 April 2016 == Related pages == * Communes of the Yonne department == References == * INSEE Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Yonne
title: Deux Rivières
